channel.title: My Text-Based Online RPG Game Forums!
channel.description:
Hi. My name is Mod Josh. I represent DragonQuest(c) and tornadoe Ltd.(c). I am advertising our website - An online text-based RPG game. The link to that is = DQ-C.tk [i]or[/i] www.geocities.com/quest_creators/DragonQuestBackUp
The link to my games forums, which we need some new members so please register :), is; http://z6.invisionfree.com/DragonQuest_Forums/index.php?s=3aa0cb099ad50997939622f1bff8b152&act=idx
Thanks for this small moment of your time. - DragonQuest Staff

item.title: My Text-Based Online RPG Game Forums!
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

(You can’t copyright a name, that’s a Trademark. Also, you can’t call yourself Ltd. when you’re not a registered limited company.)

Read full topic
